Normalizer - Klasse in Solvers.Normalizer
The normalizer takes the inputClauses provided by the supervisor and removes any immediately recognizable redundancies.
In particular:
- superfluous multiplicities of literals
- complementary literals
- immediately recognizable true or false clauses
- multiplicities dividable by the greatest common divisor
- extractable true or false literals (e.g.

Creates a Normalizer object with the given ProblemSupervisor.
